name: The Arcing Line
description:
The Arcing line is a choose your own adventure  turn based RPG.  

This was a entry for the PigSquad June Summer Slow Jam of 2022 with the theme of Character Creator and Unintended Consequences 

The games scope ended up becoming unmanageable after some things came up during development unrelated to the project so the released project does break at a point,  There is a text prompt that will come up when close to this area. 

I had to cut a lot of the combat skills out as well as cooldowns to be able to focus on  having most of the art ready on time.   There are a few skills that do nothing, if you find yourself unable to click a skill to attack with ( the bard for example ) then click attack with weapon 

Scripting, Art and Story by Yestea

Sound and Music by Nathan Audio : https://nathan-audio.itch.io/

Swordsman, Hunter,  and Mage Party Art by Lexano

Game Design by Lexano

Story Concept by Lexano
